name: Delete The Beat
description:
You slip into the role of DelTA (Delete The  Assets) a program designed to aid lazy devs with cleaning up game assets.  Unfortunately for him the project he is assigned to is littered with useless assets. That means he has a lot to do, until the game is finally clean. To make his work durable, he likes to listen to his own songs. The game itself is a rythm based platformer. DelTA can jump, dash, kick and instadrop. Those actions are reflected in musical themes in each level. The ground and obstacles are assets of very different styles.

Game has been tested on macOS ver 10.13.6
